apiResult.english: An ideal is only an ideal after all. As long as you embrace that ideal, the friction with reality will continue to increase. So you will someday face reality and will have to pay the price for your compromises.
apiResult.indo: Sebuah ideal hanya ideal setelah semua. Selama Anda memeluk ideal itu, gesekan dengan kenyataan akan terus meningkat. Jadi suatu hari Anda akan menghadapi kenyataan dan harus membayar harga untuk kompromi Anda.
